info.name: Custom Greasemonkey Icon Set
info.description:
For a long time, I found the default Greasemonkey icons to be hideously ugly, so I made my own in the style of 15x15 emoticons that we all know well.

You can also modify this style to change the toolbar button with your own custom icons!
info.additionalInfo:
Installing this style will replace the default statusbar and toolbar icons with my own.  Enjoy!

Last Update: V1.4 - 2011-09-05 - Now the sad face shows on the toolbar button when Greasemonkey is disabled in FF4+. Made legacy Firefox 3 support optional, to make style smaller.

options.label: Yes
